item.title: All the time, 27th July
item.description:
Can you actually take some action here! We are reporting here on a regular basis. Top of Hollydale road next to a tree and along the wall between 82 and 88 Ansdell road Can you put up a camera and a sign to stop this

item.title: Fly tipping including multiple gas bottles, 27th July
item.description:
People are fly tipping in the car park at Poppy Close in an area not owned by the residents. Included in the dumped rubbish are several gas bottles. The recycling centre refuses to take them giving advice to contact the local council. Local council have refused saying itâ€™s on private land. So how can they be safely disposed of? This has been going on for months with no resolution.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poppy Close, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Pot holes between Old Street and Farringdon, 27th July
item.description:

item.title: Rubbish and fly tipping, 27th July
item.description:
Not only is there scattered rubbish across the green, the flower beds/bushes have cans and other litter and there is fly tipping at the start of Buttermere Road. The area needs attention as the children are now on summer holidays and are using the green spaces more often.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Doveney Close, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
